text: @realDonaldTrump .@GOP, .@SenateGOP, .@HouseGOP, .@LindseyGrahamSC, .@senatemajldr,  #MAGA #Trump2020 He pandered to your greed, xenophobia & glee at undoing what Obama accomplished.
